channel.title: Pixels Per Inch
channel.itunes:author: Brian E. Davis
channel.description: I supervise the digitization of scholarly and archival materials for a university library in the Pacific Northwest. This podcast will document what happens along the way.
channel.itunes:subtitle: I supervise the digitization of scholarly and archival materials for a large university library in the Pacific Northwest. This podcast will document what happens along the way.
channel.itunes:summary: I supervise the digitization of scholarly and archival materials for a large university library in the Pacific Northwest. This podcast will document what happens along the way.

item.title: Geo Tagging
item.itunes:author: Pixels Per Inch
item.description: This tutorial shows how to add GIS metadata to your scanned photographs using Geotagger and Google Earth.
item.itunes:subtitle: Adding GPS Info To Photos
item.itunes:summary: This tutorial shows how to add GIS metadata to your scanned photographs using Geotagger and Google Earth.
item.itunes:keywords: Oregon State University, OSU, Pixels Per Inch, Brian E. Davis

item.title: Accessibility Tags
item.itunes:author: Pixels Per Inch
item.description: This video shows the text-to-speech benefits of adding accessibility tags to your scanned documents.
item.itunes:subtitle: Adding Accessibility Tags
item.itunes:summary: This video shows the text-to-speech benefits of adding accessibility tags to your scanned documents.
item.itunes:keywords: Oregon State University, OSU, Pixels Per Inch, Brian E. Davis

item.title: Keynote to PowerPoint
item.itunes:author: Pixels Per Inch
item.description: This tutorial shows how to convert your Keynote presentation file into a PowerPoint file.
item.itunes:subtitle: Convert Your Keynote Into a PowerPoint
item.itunes:summary: This tutorial shows how to convert your Keynote presentation file into a PowerPoint file.
item.itunes:keywords: High Point University, HPU, Pixels Per Inch, Brian E. Davis

item.title: Arrival
item.itunes:author: Pixels Per Inch
item.description: This video short features the words of Merry Masunaga as she gives her first impressions of the Poston Internment Camp. The audio was taken from an oral history she recorded in 1979 from the Department of Archives and Special Collections at Arizona State University Libraries. The color film footage of the Poston Camp is courtesy of the Arizona Historical Foundation.
item.itunes:subtitle: the Arizona Experience
item.itunes:summary: This video short features the words of Merry Masunaga as she gives her first impressions of the Poston Internment Camp. The audio was taken from an oral history she recorded in 1979 from the Department of Archives and Special Collections at Arizona State University Libraries. The color film footage of the Poston Camp is courtesy of the Arizona Historical Foundation.
item.itunes:keywords: Arizona State University, ASU, tvc15media, Brian E. Davis
